name: Brick Breaker (Game Prototype)
description:
Brick Breaker is a prototype made in Lua with the Löve 2D framework.

The objective was to compute collisions without using the integrated 2D physics framework (Box2D) for learning purpose.

Controls

  • Move the mouse to move the paddle.
  • Left-click to throw the ball.
  • Press "Escape" to quit the game
